# reinforcement-learning

## Run mock api
```bash
uvicorn main:app --reload
```

Sample responses

Enter a world:
```json
{"code":"OK","worldId":0,"runId":6177,"state":"0:0"}
```

Get location:
```json
{"code":"OK","world":"0","state":"0:0"}
```

Make a move: (all north)
